GO_TO_FULL_ANSWER_FORM: Go to the full view form
INBOX_TEMPLATE_TEXT_MESSAGE_THIS_STORED: This folder stores templates that you can use as a basis for writing repetitive emails
LETTERS_TAG_IMPORTANT_IS_NOT: No letters with the label "Important" yet
NOT_NOW_SEARCH_LETTERS: No letters found. Try to formulate the request differently
MAKE_ARE_NOT_ERRORS: Make sure there are no errors in the request
TRY_LENGTH_QUERY: Try to reduce the length of the request
IF_REMEMBER_SENDER_OR_OTHER: If you remember the sender, recipient, file names or their type, try using the advanced search or query language
TRY_FIND_LETTER_MANUALLY: Try to find the right email manually
IS_NOT_FIELD_ENTER_ADDRESS: The field is empty. You must enter an address
SUBJECT: Subject
AN_ATTACHMENT: In the form of an attachment
